    Chest, Door, Library

    public abstract class AbstractLockable
extends AbstractItem
implements Lockable, ChangeState
    Un object verrouillable
    Since:
    6.0 17/02/2020
    Version:
    6.0 17/02/2020
    Author:
    Jorys-Micke ALAÏS, Louka DOZ, Loic SENECAT, Quentin RAMSAMY-AGEORGES
